Class Banco

java.lang.Object
  Banco

public class Banco
extends java.lang.Object

The class Banco represents a bank. It only has one fields called clientes that holds the list of all the Customers of the Banco. It also has all the methods required to manipulate the customers.

Method Detail

addCustomer

public void addCustomer(java.lang.String firstName,
                        java.lang.String lastName,
                        java.lang.String id,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        java.lang.String tipo,
                        double balance)
This method handles the addition of a new Customer to the Banco by adding to the Linkedlist (in this case call clientes) a new Customer with the necesary data.

Parameters:
firstName - represents the first name of a Customer.
lastName - represents the last name of a Customer.
id - represents the id of a Customer.
password - represents the password of a Customer.
tipo - represents the type of account of a Customer.
balance - represents the balance used to create an Account instance of a Customer.

addCustomer

public void addCustomer(int position,
                        Customer client)
This method give a new way of adding a new Customer to the Linkedlist.

Parameters:
position - represents the position in which the new Customer is going to be added into the Linkedlist.
client - represents the new Customerthat is goint to be added to the Linkedlist.

ActivateCustomer

public void ActivateCustomer(int position,
                             boolean state)
This method give a way of of enabling / disabling a Customer by changing his / her state.

Parameters:
position - represents the position in which the new Customer is going to be added into the Linkedlist.
state - represents the new state of a Customer.

getCustomer

public Customer getCustomer(int posicion)
This method returns the respective Customer by reciving the position it has into the Linkedlist.

Parameters:
position - represents the position in which the new Customer is going to be added into the Linkedlist.

checkCustomer

public int checkCustomer(int startFrom,
                         java.lang.String firstName,
                         java.lang.String lastName,
                         java.lang.String password)
This method returns the position of a Customer by checking the first name ,last name and password of the Customer that are stored into the Linkedlist.It olse serves as an indicator,cause it returns -1 if the user is not found.

Parameters:
startFrom - It give a way of avoiding the problem that is cause when creating multiples Customers with the same first name and last name.
firstName - It representd the first name captured that is going to be compared with the first names of the Customer that are int the Linkedlist.
lastName - It representd the last name captured that is going to be compared with the last names of the Customer that are int the Linkedlist.
password - It representd the password captured that is going to be compared with the passwords of the Customer that are int the Linkedlist.

getNumOfCustomers

public int getNumOfCustomers()
This method returns the number of Customers that are stored in the Linkedlist

                throws java.io.IOException

                 throws java.io.IOException
